For additional context on above from @fanquake [BIP 151](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0151.mediawiki) has been withdrawn, the replacement is [BIP 324](https://gist.github.com/jonasschnelli/c530ea8421b8d0e80c51486325587c52) and the point of contact for BIP 324 appears to be @dhruv from this point on.
